message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'm not starting with the minimum, Alice. Your turn to respond!
You're not starting with the minimum, Bob, so I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. Your turn!
You're getting more aggressive, Alice. Time to make it worth my while!
You're not budging, Bob? Alright, I'll make a strong move. This is my best offer so far!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'm making my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm making my move. Take it or leave it!
It's getting desperate, Bob. I'm making a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it!
